quote: 行動勝於空談。(Actions speak louder than words.)
熟能生巧。(Practice makes perfect.)
條條大路通羅馬。(All roads lead to Rome.)
早起的鳥兒有蟲吃。(The early bird catches the worm.)
有備無患。(Forewarned is forearmed.)
眼見為實。(Seeing is believing.)
滴水穿石。(Constant dripping wears away a stone.)
入鄉隨俗。(When in Rome, do as the Romans do.)
沉默是金。(Silence is golden.)
欲速則不達。(Haste makes waste.)
work: 多國諺語 (與 fq025 相似)

quote: 患難見真情。(A friend in need is a friend indeed.)
知足者常樂。(Enough is as good as a feast. / Happiness consists in contentment.)
團結就是力量。(Unity is strength.)
時間治癒一切創傷。(Time heals all wounds.)
一鳥在手勝過雙鳥在林。(A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush.)
習慣是第二天性。(Habit is second nature.)
自助者天助。(Heaven helps those who help themselves.)
work: 多國諺語 (與 fq027 相似)

quote: 知識的開端是發現我們所不知的事物。(The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand.)
author: 法蘭克·赫伯特 (Frank Herbert) (雖為作家，此句有諺語的普遍性)

quote: 種瓜得瓜，種豆得豆。(As you sow, so shall you reap.)
work: 多國諺語 (與 pv001 相似)

quote: 凡事豫則立，不豫則廢。(Success depends on previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.)
work: 中國諺語 (源自《禮記·中庸》)

quote: 授人以魚不如授人以漁。(Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.)
work: 中國諺語 (或源自其他文化)

quote: 不入虎穴，焉得虎子。(Nothing venture, nothing gain. / You can't make an omelette without breaking eggs.)
少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲。(If you neglect your studies when you are young, what an old man you will be!)
work: 中國諺語 (源自漢樂府《長歌行》)

quote: 勿以惡小而為之，勿以善小而不為。(Do not do an evil act just because it is trivial; do not neglect a good act just because it is small.)
author: 劉備 (Liu Bei)

quote: 十年樹木，百年樹人。(It takes ten years to nurture a tree, but a hundred years to cultivate people.)
work: 中國諺語 (源自《管子·權修》)

quote: 天網恢恢，疏而不漏。(Heaven's net is vast, but it misses nothing. / The mills of God grind slowly, yet they grind exceeding small.)
書中自有黃金屋，書中自有顏如玉。(Within books, one can find houses of gold; within books, one can find ladies as fair as jade.)
author: 宋真宗 (Emperor Zhenzong of Song) (《勸學文》)

quote: 靜水流深。(Still waters run deep.)
覆水難收。(It is no use crying over spilled milk. / What's done is done.)
萬事起頭難。(Every beginning is hard.)
